PSO.heroSubtitle: Oil and gas production system optimization methodology.

about.title: PSO – Production System Optimization
about.p1: The Production System Optimization (PSO) methodology is a practical approach to optimizing oil and gas production systems, outlined in the book of the same name by Borney Waring (Shell).
about.quote: "Production system optimization is a targeted process of improving the efficiency of an existing field development system through the implementation of management and technological solutions that provide value growth in the short and medium term."
about.p2: To date, 17 fields have been successfully optimized using this approach, generating over $1.1 billion in additional profit.
about.p3: Our strategic goal is to promote the dissemination and application of PSO in the oil and gas industry of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
about.p4: One of the key directions is the implementation and teaching of the "Production System Optimization" discipline within KBTU programs with emphasis on practical knowledge and international experience.
